Publication Title: Molecular weight of hyaluronic acid crosslinked into biomaterial scaffolds affects angiogenic potential
Publication Keywords: Angiogenesis, Hyaluronic acid, Wound healing, hydrogels, CD44
Publication Authors: Josh Karam, Breahna J Singer, Hiromi Miwa, Limin H Chen, Kajal Maran, Mahdi Hasani, Sarahi Garza, Bianca Onyekwere, Hsin-Chih Yeh, Song Li, Dino Di Carlo, Stephanie K Seidlits
Publication Abstract: While hyaluronic acid (HA)-based hydrogels have been used clinically for decades, the mechanisms by which HA exerts molecular weight-dependent bioactivity and how chemical modification and crosslinking may affect molecular weight-dependent bioactivity remain poorly understood.
